name: Blink
requirements:
Any Attunement
Trigger: You are hit by an Attack or a Spell
effect:
Make a Willpower roll. If your roll is higher than the attack roll that hit you, you dodge the attack - the attack misses you.
If you dodge, you can immediately move 1+WIL squares - this movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks, and you can cross squares occupied by enemies (but you cannot end your movement there).

name: Blurred Step
effect:
You can move 2+WIL squares - this movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks, and you can cross squares occupied by enemies (but you cannot end your movement there).
At the end of the movement, you gain {effect:vigor}.

name: Crystal Prison
effect:
HIT - Make an opposed Willpower roll against the target. 
If your roll is higher, until you mantain the upkeep, the target can't perform any actions during its turn.
If the target is attacked and/or damaged, the spell breaks (you no longer have to maintain your upkeep).

name: Elemental Bolt
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Fire or Frost damage (according to your attunement).
DAMAGE - According to your attunement: Fire: Inflicts {effect:burning}, Frost: Inflicts {effect:crippled}.

name: Elemental Weapon
effect:
Your Melee Weapon becomes infused with Fire or Frost energy (according to your attunement).
Whenever you make a Melee Attack with the infused weapon, on damage you also inflict {effect:burning} (Fire) or {effect:crippled} (Frost).

name: Elemental Barrier
effect:
Whenever you are hit by a Melee Attack, the attacker is {effect:crippled} (Frost) or is {effect:burning} (Fire).
In addition, if you are not wearing any armor, your Armor is increased by 2.

name: Ethereal Armor
requirements:
Any Attunement
Can only be used during your turn
effect:
When you cast Ethereal Armor, put 6 tokens on it. When you lose a Wound, you remove a token instead.
When the last token is removed, the  make a WIL roll against the MASS of all creatures adjacent to you. On success, the creature is pushed 2 squares.

name: Fireball
target:
Creatures in a 3x3 area 
centered on a square in range 6
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Fire damage.
DAMAGE - The target is {effect:burning}.

name: Frost Shock
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Frost damage.
DAMAGE - Inflicts {effect:crippled}, and the target is {effect:stunned}.

name: Ice Blast
target: Creatures in a 3x3 area adjacent to you

name: Incinerate
requirements:
Fire Attunement
The target must be {effect:burning}
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Fire damage.
DAMAGE - If the target is Injured after the inflicted damage, make a Willpower roll vs target's Toughness roll - if you win, the target is immediately Dying.

name: Purifying Flames
requirements:
Fire Attunement
The target must be {effect:burning}
effect: HIT - [Spell] Fire damage, and you gain {effect:regeneration}. If you cast this spell in double attunement, you can spend all your remaining energy and recover the same amount of Wounds.
